stimulusHtml:
A school that does not have air conditioning has published a policy to close school when the outside temperature reaches or exceeds 95°F. The following code segment is intended to print a message indicating whether or not the school is open, based on the temperature. Assume that the variable degrees has been properly declared and initialized with the outside temperature.

if (degrees > 95)

{

System.out.println("School will be closed due to extreme heat");

}

else

{

System.out.println("School is open");

}

Which of the following initializations for degrees, if any, will demonstrate that the code segment may not work as intended?
choicesHtml: The code will work as intended for all values of degrees.
